name: hollo
description: Hollo is a minimal ActivityPub compatible social server from the Fedify project. It is intended as a reference implementation for building federated apps and offers a small, understandable codebase for experimentation.
features: ActivityPub Server: Minimal implementation of ActivityPub protocol for federated social networking.
Reference Implementation: Clean, understandable codebase designed for learning and experimentation.
Federation Support: Connect with Mastodon, Pleroma, and other ActivityPub-compatible platforms.
Lightweight Design: Minimal dependencies and simple architecture for easy deployment.
Developer-Friendly: Well-documented code ideal for understanding federated protocols.
Fedify Project: Part of the Fedify ecosystem for building federated applications.
Educational Tool: Perfect for developers learning about decentralized social networks.
Extensible Base: Use as a foundation for building custom federated applications.
